page.title: 11Recreation _ local clubs
page.content: There is alot of leisure clubs in our area.At the youth club there is fourteen going to the small youth club.In the big youth alot of people go.There is table tennis,snooker and pool,uni hoc,tv games also there is a big piece of cardboard for breakdance. The names of the moves you can do is headspins,windmill,handspins,backspin, poppin,suicide.Rugby is played by kids and dads.Flimby rugby team is open aged.Kids from Flimby and the surrounding area play for Glasson Rangers.The Youth Club also has swimming lessons on a Monday night at 7 o'clock. The swimming is at Netherhall School baths. Dads play sports like rugby, snooker, pool,and darts.Mums play tennis,snooker and dominoes. The Working Mens Club is a very popular place for Mams and dads at night.
